benchmark_details.name: ASAG2024 (A Combined Benchmark for Short Answer Grading)
benchmark_details.overview: The ASAG2024 benchmark facilitates the comparison of automated grading systems and combines seven commonly used short-answer grading datasets in a common structure and grading scale.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for the assessment of automated short-answer grading systems.

data.source: Combined from seven commonly used short-answer grading datasets.
data.annotation: Each dataset must contain reference answers, provided answers by humans, and grades.

methodology.calculation: wRMSE is calculated by weighting the grades according to how often similar grades appear in the data source.
methodology.interpretation: Lower RMSE values indicate better accuracy in grading predictions.
methodology.baseline_results: Mean error of GPT-3.5-turbo is 0.30 and GPT-4o is 0.27.
methodology.validation: Initial evaluations of existing automated grading solutions are presented.
